name: ITESA & Get Customer Experience
overview: Focusing on Brand and Strategic elements to optimize, Customer Experience, Journey and Touch Point Sacred Moments and CRM interactions (not just software). Working with companies and governments to develop solutions to communicate and connect globally, attract investment locally and compete more effectively. Client legacy includes McGraw-Hill, Microsoft, Apple, Time Warner, Citibank, CUNA and dozens of other projects in Americas, Asia Pacific and EMEA. We focus on Customer Experience Journey, help private and government sector organizations answer questions around Attraction, Interaction and Cultivation of relationships for lifetime value. Questions include: a. What is your Promise and How do you Deliver it? (Talkit and Walkit) b. Where do you want to Deliver the Promise? (Expandit) c. How Do Employees Engage and Customers Experience?
